July 23, 2013

Hello Jekyll

I redesigned my website recently and decided to build it with Jekyll, a static site generator. What I love about Jekyll is that there’s no database to manage, I can write my posts in Markdown and when I $ git push to Github, my website is automatically updated.

At some point I would like to document my workflow and how I set up Jekyll. One thing I want to point out is guard-jekyll-plus by Brandon Mathisâ€“it’s a must-have plugin if you’re compiling Sass.
